Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities directly followed by \Payment Handled\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ activities that lead to \Payment Handled\ within the same case.
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities with amounts above 100 euros.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities by \SYSTEM\ resource.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities over \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases where \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ occurred.
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Payment Handled' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage decrease in \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ activities before \Payment Handled\ after implementing improvement measures.
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ to \Payment Handled\.
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that conclude a case.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities grouped by \case:BudgetNumber\.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities grouped by the last value of case:BudgetNumber

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that follow \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\ without any rejections in between.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of \Payment Handled\ activities in relation to the total number of activities in the event log.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases with \Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER\ versus without.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of \Payment Handled\ activities that occur after \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\ as a measure of process inefficiency.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Payment Handled\ activities that are followed by any corrective or appeal activities.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Total \Payment Handled\ performed by \SYSTEM\ resource as a measure of automation efficiency.
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of \Payment Handled\ activities in cases with prior \Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION\ to identify process bottlenecks.
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
